nodes.text: The Rapid Fire Turret was a weapon that was used by both the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic. In defense, it excels at taking out support units, and has no specific weaknesses against any other units, playing a generalist role.
The Rapid Fire Turret first appeared in the 2014 mobile game Star Wars: Commander as an emplacement that a player could build to defend their base.
